titles.title: Veterans' Compensation Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 1993
Veterans' Compensation Rates Amendments of 1993
Veterans' Compensation Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 1993
Veterans' Compensation Cost-of-Living Adjustment Act of 1993
Veterans' Compensation Rates Amendments of 1993
A bill to increase the rates of compensation for veterans with service-connected disabilities and the rates of dependency and indemnity compensation for the survivors of certain disabled veterans.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3185)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.
Committee on Veterans. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 103-492.

calendar.text: Committee on Veterans. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

action.text: Committee on Veterans. Reported to Senate by Senator Rockefeller with amendments. With written report No. 103-55.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 90.

vote.text: Passed Senate with amendments by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Mr. Montgomery asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
The House struck all after the enacting clause and inserted in lieu thereof the provisions of a similar measure H.R. 3340. Agreed to without objection.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
A similar measure H.R. 3340 was laid on the table without objection.
The title of the measure was amended to that of similar measure H.R. 3340. Agreed to without objection.
Message on House action received in Senate and at desk: House amendments to Senate bill.
Senate agreed to the House amendments by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 11/2/1993--Passed House amended. Veterans' Compensation Rates Amendments of 1993 - Increases, as of December 1, 1993, the rates of veterans' disability compensation, additional compensation for dependents, the clothing allowance for certain disabled adult veterans, dependency and indemnity compensation (DIC) for surviving spouses and children, and supplemental DIC for disabled adult children.
